br.octahedron.cotopaxi.view.formatter
Class FormatterBuilder

java.lang.Object
  br.octahedron.cotopaxi.view.formatter.FormatterBuilder

public class FormatterBuilder
extends Object

A builder for formatters. It creates the right Formatter for a given format. It looks at the CotopaxiConfigView to check which Formatter should be used for each format.

Author:
Danilo Penna Queiroz - daniloqueiroz@octahedron.com.br

getFormatter

public Formatter getFormatter(String format)
                       throws FormatterNotFoundException
Gets the Formatter for the given format. If there's no Formatter registered for the given format, it returns null.

Throws:
FormatterNotFoundException
